trans-unit.source: Enables you to maintain or view data for a contact person at the supplier.

seg-source.mrk: Enables you to maintain or view data for a contact person at the supplier.

target.mrk: 使您能够维护或查看供应商联系人的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can enter or view data for a contact person at the supplier, namely an identifier or the name of the <uicontrol>Salesperson</uicontrol>, the salesperson´s <uicontrol>Telephone</uicontrol> number, and reference data for the contact person.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter or view data for a contact person at the supplier, namely an identifier or the name of the <uicontrol>Salesperson</uicontrol>, the salesperson´s <uicontrol>Telephone</uicontrol> number, and reference data for the contact person.

target.mrk: 您可以输入或查看供应商联系人的数据，即<uicontrol>销售员</uicontrol>的标识符或名称、销售员的<uicontrol>电话</uicontrol>号码以及联系人的参考数据。

trans-unit.source: In the field <uicontrol>Salesperson</uicontrol>, you can enter a free text with up to 30 characters.

seg-source.mrk: In the field <uicontrol>Salesperson</uicontrol>, you can enter a free text with up to 30 characters.

target.mrk: 在<uicontrol>销售员</uicontrol>字段中，您可以输入最多 30 个字符的自由文本。

trans-unit.source: As a <cite>reference</cite>, you can enter an acronym with up to 12 characters that identifies the person responsible for the purchase order in your supplier´s company (<uicontrol>Your Reference</uicontrol>) and in your own company (<uicontrol>Our Reference</uicontrol>).

seg-source.mrk: As a <cite>reference</cite>, you can enter an acronym with up to 12 characters that identifies the person responsible for the purchase order in your supplier´s company (<uicontrol>Your Reference</uicontrol>) and in your own company (<uicontrol>Our Reference</uicontrol>).

target.mrk: 作为<cite>参考</cite>，您可以输入最多 12 个字符的缩略词，用于标识供应商公司（<uicontrol>您的参考</uicontrol>）和您自己公司（<uicontrol>我们的参考</uicontrol>）中的采购订单负责人。

trans-unit.source: You can use the maintained data for the contact person as a filter for the list of purchase orders displayed in the object list of the app <uicontrol>Manage Purchase Orders</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: You can use the maintained data for the contact person as a filter for the list of purchase orders displayed in the object list of the app <uicontrol>Manage Purchase Orders</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 您可以将联系人的维护数据用作<uicontrol>管理采购订单</uicontrol>应用的对象清单中显示的采购订单清单的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The data of the contact person is saved with the purchase order, not with the master data of the supplier.

seg-source.mrk: The data of the contact person is saved with the purchase order, not with the master data of the supplier.

target.mrk: 联系人的数据与采购订单一起保存，而不是与供应商的主数据一起保存。
